comments.author: joeyaiello
comments.body: In what document do you see that link? The correct link is https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/releases/download/v6.0.0-alpha.15/PowerShell_6.0.0-alpha.15-win10-win2k16-x64.msi

comments.body: It's the main MSI link for Windows 10/Server 2k16 in the readme.

comments.author: NathansNexus
comments.body: If you click the link it takes you to a 404, but if you right click Save link as, it works. I guess the issue should be closed, or links fixed to open directly to the .msi URL.
